HotelElement.Name: The Club Saujana Resort Kuala Lumpur

Address.Address1: Saujana Resort, Jalan Lapangan Terbang Saas

Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Shah Alam, The Club at The Saujana is on a lake, minutes from Saujana Golf and Country Club, and close to Glenmarie Golf and Country Club. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Paradigm Mall and Kelana Jaya Lake Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature designer toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. After practicing your swing on the golf course, you can enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and a health club. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can get around on the complimentary shuttle, which operates within 12 km.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Meet other guests and eat at a complimentary reception.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Saujana Golf and Country Club - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Glenmarie Golf and Country Club - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Paradigm Mall - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Kelana Jaya Lake Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Subang Parade - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Empire Shopping Gallery - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Shah Alam Stadium - 4.8 km / 3 mi
LDP Cable-Stayed Bridge - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Centre Point - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Sunway Pyramid Mall - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Sunway Pyramid Shopping Centre - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Sunway Pyramid Convention Centre - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Sunway Lagoon Theme Park - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
1 Utama - 6 km / 3.7 mi
KidZania - 6.5 km / 4.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Subang (SZB-Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah) - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Kuala Lumpur (KUL-Kuala Lumpur Intl.) - 41.3 km / 25.7 mi

The preferred airport for The Club at The Saujana is Kuala Lumpur (KUL-Kuala Lumpur Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
